nodes.text: Nen was the star of the Neimoidia system, a part of the regions known as the Colonies and the Slice. It was orbited by the planet Neimoidia and its sole moon. Situated along the Trellen Trade Route, Nen sat at grid square N-10 on the Standard Galactic Grid.

Nen was first mentioned in the new Star Wars canon in the fifty-second issue of De Agostini's Star Wars: Build the Millennium Falcon magazine, published around December 30, 2015. The image used to depict Nen was also used in Star Wars: Build the Millennium Falcon to illustrate several other stars.

In the Star Wars Legends continuity, Nen was introduced via an indirect mention in Cloak of Deception, a 2001 novel authored by James Luceno. It was later identified in The Essential Atlas, a 2009 reference book authored by Jason Fry and Daniel Wallace.
